website_summaries.verdict: If the high price doesn't deter you, the quality and wholesomeness will impress both you and your feline.
pros: A superior protein-rich snack made of just one wholesome ingredient: freeze-dried chicken breast
Made in small batches to ensure top quality and freshness
Consumers rave about how much their cats love them
cons: If you want to treat your cat to them frequently, the price will add up – you only get 4 ounces per pack
Some packages contain a lot of crumbs

website_summaries.verdict: A good option for those looking for single-ingredient treats for their cats.
pros: Low fat but high in protein
Can be used for cats or dogs
Customers noted the chicken appears to be high quality
cons: Most packages contain a fair amount of treats that have been crushed into dust

customer_reviews.title: My kitty even loves the bags!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this! So much so that after buying the smaller bag, i bought 2 bags of the larger size. The larger bags seemed to have more of the tougher pieces that my cat cannot chew, and more "crumbs" i presume because of shipping. So i am going to keep ordering the smaller bag. When I called to discuss my issues, the marketing person was VERY NICE and explained about some of the meat not having as much fat which causes the tougher pieces. She returned my call very quickly and i continue to be impressed by the qualityof this company!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: My Cats LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 cats devour an entire bag in virtually no time! They BEG for it and when they see me open the bag they compete for the closest position. I have to divide the bag into separate dishes. Even so, each cat grabs a piece and runs off into their favorite spot to devour it before returning for more. One cat will stick her paw in another’s dish a steal a piece! HILARIOUS to watch them sneak off with their “prize catches) and devour them! The negative is cleaning up the crumbs, here and there and everywhere! But well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Mullenix

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Treat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these freeze dried chicken treats! He sits and stares up at the area where these treats are. Never has he loved a treat or food more than these. They are expensive though! $20 for 9 ounces. Thankfully I had a coupon so I was able to purchase these for my fur baby. However, he doesn't like the cod or turkey so I haven't bought the tuna or salmon treats for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Treat
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these and they are great for treat puzzles. The fine powder from some of the bits that crumble are also a great addition to their regular food and they eagerly eat it up. I like that it is one ingredient and all natural so I can feel good about giving my cats these treats. Even better that my cats love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks?
customer_reviews.text: My cat won’t even take a bite of this. I’m wondering if it has a different smell from the True Bites brand, that my cat loves. The chicken is very white in color & I wondered if it had been soaked or sprayed with something that made it so white. My cat goes up to it & then lifts her head up like it has a bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Cat favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My fur buddy loves these and they are useful for training him to do high fives and come when called. The Only negative, which is the same thing is wrong with all of these types of treats, is that the last 1/5 of the bag is dust. I just add this does to his food for him an extra treat.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality.
customer_reviews.text: My cat's love this. All I have to do is crinkle the bag and they mad run to me. As others have said, it's the crack of the cat kingdom. Whole Life makes the best version of this I've used. I've tried cheaper brands but found some pieces had to he thrown out due to a rancid odor. I do wish this was cheaper but I understand I'm paying for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: A mess that has an easy fix
customer_reviews.text: My kitty goes NUTS for these treats!!!! They are extremely delicate and crumble EASILY. But, if kitty's happy, then I'm happy! I've tried 3 other treats and THIS is the only one she'll eat. There's going to be a lot of dust and small pieces left at the bottom of the bag when the larger pieces have been given out but I just put them in her feeding bowl with a little bit of water and wallah, a mini meal that she gobbles up!
customer_reviews.author: LennyP

customer_reviews.title: Initially didn't like this product then I soaked them in water and it changed my mind.
customer_reviews.text: My previous review stated, "The product is very crumbly and there for very messy. One cat will eat them, the other won't. On a positive note my dog loves to clean up the mess." However, I tried wetting them and then offering them to my kitties and the love them. I will purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Whole Life Chicken Not for Them
customer_reviews.text: Since my two cats have been eating the Whole Life Salmon, eating their chicken brand was not for them. I was excited about them trying the chicken, but both of them sniffed it, looked at me, sniffed it again and walked away. One came back later and decided to bat the pieces around with her foot. With that, I decided to sniff those little pieces and it smelled like nothing, which is why I gave this only three stars. I sealed up the package, and will give it away to someone who has cats that aren't so persnickety. It's back to the salmon for these two!! They just love that flavor!
customer_reviews.author: ChaCha123

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - chicken
customer_reviews.text: for whatever reason - the chicken flavor always seems to come mostly “powered”. The chunks in bag are mostly powder and useless. Does not seem to happen with other flavors (fish or turkey). Cats love these treats but not when in powder form.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Healthy snack!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is crazy about these so I use them as his between meal snacks. I like the fact that I don’t have to feel guilty giving them as treats, there are no additives or empty calories.
customer_reviews.author: Housecat

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: Great cat treats, however the powder at the bottom or crushed pieces should be mixed into cat wet food because they will breath it in and choke/ sneeze/ not get to eat it. But, thats a great topper for wetfood anyway.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Rosie-cat loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest to what the flavor’s like, but my cat enjoys these treats immensely. The pieces are rather large, so I usually break them into smaller pieces for my kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Keeks Mann

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Yes. 100x Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a great that my cat will eat. I’ve tried multiple brands, at many different price levels. No interest. A friend suggested these. I have never seen him so excited to eat anything before! After he finished his treat he ran around the entire room looking for more! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Two Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: I finally figured out my princess Tillie loves freeze dried chicken and turkey. Very happy about that because I want her to have good quality food and treats. These were great - said my cat. She loved it although I would've like smaller pieces as she wouldn't eat them until I broke them up. By the time we finished the bag there was a good handful of crumbs that would've easily made several whole treats. Definitely real chicken. Tillie gives it two paws up. Will buy again but make smaller pieces please!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! My cat loves these!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is recovering from Hepatic Lipidosis and eating is the cure. I have been trying to tempt her with every kind of food and treat out there. I'm so excited to have found this treat. She loves it and its a healthy natural treat! So I've been gradually getting rid of the other treats and she's not missing them. She goes nuts for these.
customer_reviews.author: chelleann

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to find single ingredient products that can serve as snacks and that are easy to break into small pieces
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats is allergic to fish and shellfish and turkey. It's hard to find single ingredient products that can serve as snacks and that are easy to break into small pieces. This chicken is amazing. Although sometimes I do find really hard to break apart pieces, most of them are soft but crunchy enough for my cat to enjoy and I don't have to worry about hidden allergens in this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ga

customer_reviews.title: Kitties Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The kitties absolutely love this product. Its a tad pricey and I've had problems with part of the package crushed into dust but I still by it as the kitties adore it!
customer_reviews.author: Spyoki

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! SO MUCH BETTER than PureBites.... had to find another freeze dried chicken treat for my cats because PureBites was going down hill in quality..... this was THE PERFECT solution and I'll continue to buy these instead now! My cat seems to love them and they are very easy to crumble on top of their food! Seems like a GREAT QUALITY ALL MEAT pure chicken freeze dried treat and no greasy stringy HARD as a rock pieces like we were getting in the PureBites bags!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C🌺L

customer_reviews.title: My cat said NO Maybe others would like
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is supposed to be dry, but maybe it should be crunchy When opening the bag no aroma My cat does not turn his nose up at too many foods but walked away doing shaking paw which cat owners would recognize
customer_reviews.author: nancy b

customer_reviews.title: Good for diabetic cats.
customer_reviews.text: My diabetic cat loves these and they have no carbs so they are good for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great but crumby...
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love these. Even the one that doesn’t like dry treats love these. My complaint is that, like many other people, the bag is at least 1/2 powdered chicken crumbs. For the price, I’d expect all full pieces of chicken. I’d also like them to be in bite size pieces.
customer_reviews.author: RedLuvr

customer_reviews.title: My cat goes crazy for these things. I used ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy for these things. I used to get Grandma Lucy's equivalent thing, but these were cheaper and honestly, the guy in the video eating them was what sold me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: If cats could talk, they would demand this daily. Oh my....they go bonkers when this package comes out of the pantry door! They are so so with cat treats, but these are like prime rib to a meat loving human. Even my most finicky carpet that won’t touch canned food or most treats, relishes in these.
customer_reviews.author: seaside77

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is way too dehydrated. The pieces are too big for a cat and when you try to break them apart they crumble into dust. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJW

customer_reviews.title: It's a powder
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived crushed into a powder. Out of a 4 oz bag I might have found a dozen bite size pieces.
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: These treats are approved greatly by out cats
customer_reviews.text: Our cats can't have grain, so we look for whole treats. These treats are loved by the cats. The package did not break up the peices in shipping. These are the only dry treats we give!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Healy

customer_reviews.title: Way to hard! Stale
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard I literally have to throw away the package. Maybe 1 piece was breakable for me to separate. So dangerous to give a cat this as it is. I’ve never had this issue with freeze dried treats.
customer_reviews.author: Lets be real..

customer_reviews.title: A unique but great snack for the felid.
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves it. I crush a piece with my hand into his food bowl to make it easier to eat, but I think he'd do fine with it whole. He was very briefly bewildered by the novel treat but he's eaten it without hesitation since the two seconds after I first gave it to him. We both like that they're just pieces of chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Ben H.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty demands what kitty loves.
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger pieces unlike the smaller uniform sized pieces of other brands. The pieces break easily, but there's the problem...lots and lots of chicken powder. Don't get me wrong, she eats the powder, it's just a messy, sometimes wasteful, ordeal.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.G.

customer_reviews.title: They should have named this - chicken chalk!
customer_reviews.text: Awful, just awful. I’ve tried many, many freeze dried cat treats but this was a first. I opened the package and it looked like sticks of chalk - way too white, loads of powder, it didn’t even look like food. Lesson learned...
customer_reviews.author: Hejira

customer_reviews.title: This Is a Miracle Treat for My Cat
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is my cat's favorite. I use it as topping only, otherwise she'll devour the whole package at once:) She is a super picky eater, and this is the only food she always wants right away. However, it's rather pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely goes gaga over this. He eats it dry (I break up some of the larger pieces) and he also eats it reconstituted with a little water. He comes running when I open the bag. I use the salmon flavor to help with pill taking.
customer_reviews.author: pattysue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chicken Treat for Cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats go crazy for this 100% chicken treat. Each night, I give them a few pieces and they know it is time for their treat because I yell out, "Kitty Krack", and they come flying. This is an excellent product to use as a training treat as well. It is messy to give it to them right out of the package, so I put some in a bowl, add a little water to the chicken pieces to plump it back to its natural state. They will eagerly eat it no matter what form it is in.
customer_reviews.author: carol. w.

customer_reviews.title: Good protein for pets
customer_reviews.text: These freeze-dried chicken pieces are great treats for the two cats (good for dogs, too). The only reason this product gets four stars instead of five is that a number of the pieces are very hard and/or have sharp edges. That means breaking them into smaller bits to be sure there are no hard, sharp pieces being swallowed. Some are too much and are discarded, although some pet owners feel they're okay. That aspect aside, these tasty morsels are adored by the cats and the protein is excellent for them. In spite of the minor hassle above, very pleased with this product and the nutrition and pleasure it provides for the two furry felines.
customer_reviews.author: jen connor

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - quality doesn’t come cheap
customer_reviews.text: So much better than other freeze dried chicken I’ve purchased. I use it as a topper to help older or sick cats smell and enjoy their foods. It’s been a huge help a number of times over
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: cat approved
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these. Some days he refuses to touch his food unless I crush and sprinkle some of this over it like a fine spice (the rest of the days, he just begs for it outright). The fact that it's 100% chicken (no weird ingredients, no preservatives, etc.) makes me feel better about giving in to his demands!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cat Treat
customer_reviews.text: All three of our cats ranging from young to old really LOVED these treats. I am ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Rock

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love
customer_reviews.text: My cats are addicted to these treats so they get to have a little bit of the treat every night. It comes in a few flavors which makes it nice.
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these more than any other treat I've tried. He comes running as soon as I open the drawer I keep them in. I know I'm giving him the real thing, and it's something that he loves and is healthy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CT. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Dog and cat love this
customer_reviews.text: Dog and cat love it as usual~new label here, but have bought these and others of their products for years now. Some stores used to carry, but not any of ours any more, so good to find/buy on Amazon and Chewy. Very simple list of ingredients (one) so easy to read what the animals are getting/eating.
customer_reviews.author: janieb53

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. I cut them into smaller pieces and use the “dust” to sprinkle on their food. We call it the magic dust!
customer_reviews.author: allycat

customer_reviews.title: Milo loves his chicken treat!
customer_reviews.text: My Ragdoll cat, Milo, loves his dehydrated chicken treat! Great for his teeth! Very fresh and nutritious! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!  My cats love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: My cats can't get enough of this... They would eat the WHOLE bag if I let them. The chunky pieces of dried chicken are solid but occasionally I will get lots of dried chicken dust in these bags. I spread it on their food but its not the same. The cats love to hear the word 'TREATS' and the bonding time is what makes this fun. Less dust and more chunks would be great. I gave it 4 stars because my cats would give it 5 stars but they don't know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Patticakes

customer_reviews.title: There are a couple other brands that they like, but this one
customer_reviews.text: Cats go crazy for this. There are a couple other brands that they like, but this one... above and beyond. Easy to give as large treats or crumble. Never tried wetting the stuff because they like it as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Clara W.

customer_reviews.title: Can be messy and dusty but totally worth it! Healthy kitty treats they absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: Kitties didn’t know what to make of it at first. Batted it around the house and made quite a mess with the dust particles the first few times. But now, they wait for me to leave every morning so they can have their treat before I head out to work for the day. They’re totally addicted!!
customer_reviews.author: mak2057

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love them
customer_reviews.text: My 3 cats come running anytime I open the package! They love them! I break them up some and put in a treat puzzle
customer_reviews.author: Beth L. Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, do the cats love these. Even the picky eater likes them. Being freeze-dried, they are a little dry but if you sprinkle water on them, they hydrate quick. There is a fair amount of chicken dust in the bag from the pieces rubbing together but I just shake it over their normal food and they wolf it down.
customer_reviews.author: Erik S.

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves chicken products. But this is the one product he doesn’t like so far. The bits are too large and hard to bite for my cat. Unlike Stella & Chewy, there is almost no smell of food in this product. It’s also hard to break it into small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: liilyzhu

customer_reviews.title: Dust
customer_reviews.text: This product was expensive and when arrived was 95 % dust. What a rip off! I will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Catladylover

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: He's a treat-a-holic, so he'll eat any treat, but he especially loves this. I also use it as a special treat for the cats at the shelter who I'm trying to socialize. I used to buy the cat version, but then I realized the dog version is the same, just bigger pieces and much cheaper! So now I buy the dog version and break them up :) I love that it looks like true chicken!
customer_reviews.author: Kawidood

customer_reviews.title: Crumbles
customer_reviews.text: Good news: My cats go bonkers for these. They are 100% pure chicken with no other ingredients. Bad news: They are very very brittle and half the bag is chicken powder. Can't call chicken powder a treat. So I sprinkle it on their food. Five stars for flavor. One star for usability. Average three stars.
customer_reviews.author: LBH

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Pieces of chicken were ok but most were crushed and you were left with a bag of crumbs and powder
customer_reviews.author: junita ries-brown

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my cat's favorite treat and it's actually very healthy so I feel good letting them have it. I keep it on hand to reward their good behavior because it's not cheap, but I like to have it because they love it so. My fabulous cat sitting ladies introduced it to my cats when I had to be away for 2 weeks. Needless to say, they were my cat's favorite ever catsitters.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Shields

customer_reviews.title: High value treat
customer_reviews.text: I use these for extra special training treats for my cat. I break them in half for him. He indicates they are his FAVORITE treat!!!
customer_reviews.author: RVartist

customer_reviews.title: I have two cats that love freeze dried chicken
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that love freeze dried chicken. The pieces in this bag are large chunks of meat - some other brands are little buts, and crumbs. I like that it is made in the US, and you can tell it is quality. I wish it was a little less expensive, but I buy it as a special treat for them.
customer_reviews.author: smores2

customer_reviews.title: The cat said NOPE!
customer_reviews.text: The look we got when we offered our fur baby the treat was the "are you freaking kidding me?" look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's way too little for the price.. these ...
customer_reviews.text: It's way too little for the price.. these don't even last a week for my cats. They are no more special than the halo ones that come in a larger container for a cheaper price
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it wasn’t 1/2 full of crumbs
customer_reviews.text: The cats love these, but I’m tired of a bag full of crumbs. These are expensive and I don’t appreciate the crumbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H

customer_reviews.title: best cat or dog treat around
customer_reviews.text: pure chicken white meat cooked and freeze dried sourced in the USA and made in the USA safe for your cat or dog. YOu can feed them dry or rehydrate. If your pet does not drink much water then I would not feed them dry. Our cat is in love with water so I give them to him as a dry treat.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Brooks

customer_reviews.title: No carb high protein but crunchy treats healthy to give your pet!
customer_reviews.text: These whole meat treats are perfect for getting cats off the kibble. These are pure meat high protein treats good to give to diabetic cats especially and very useful when kibble must be eliminated from the diet and these have crunch which the cats seem to crave.
customer_reviews.author: petlover

customer_reviews.title: Crazy cat likes it; recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Plain ole chicken! My cat adores this treat. She eats it straight up, eats easy on her stomach (shes older) and I can mix it into her food when I need to bulk it up. She goes crazy when she hears the bag open. Keep in mind my cat is an a**ho** and is super picky. So believe me, worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: M. Citro

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! She goes absolutely bonkers over them. I was previously buying purebites, but the quality has declined and I was looking for a suitable substitute for her treat. These are soft and crumble easily. Will definitely reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Mahajan

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: Indoor cat, Hissie, really likes the treat and there healthy for her. She's a little over weight and on a diet so this is good treat for her.
customer_reviews.author: DarcyRae

customer_reviews.title: Magical properties
customer_reviews.text: This product is endorsed by the highest authority available. All we need to do is take the package out of the drawer, and a feline expert appears from anywhere in the house. We rehydrate the product a little, and the little guy can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: C. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this !
customer_reviews.text: I fed it to them dry at first, until my old guy choked on it. Now it is soaked in water for ten minutes or so until it is soft all the way thru. I have to hide it in the refrigerator or they will be bad and jump on the counter to get it.
customer_reviews.author: max c colley

customer_reviews.title: My Cat likes this treat too much😁
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this treat. It's pricey and that's why I gave it 4 stars. If it was less expensive would of gave 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: snoopybarbie

customer_reviews.title: Watch Your Fingers!
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes absolutely bonkers for this freeze dried chicken. Definitely MUST soak in water for a bit until it's rehydrated, and then just squeeze out excess moisture. My cat is not very demonstrative, but as soon as I take this stuff out she's all over me and biting at my fingers. This product is far superior to regular "people" chicken because it's dry storable. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA SANDROCK

customer_reviews.title: Whole Life
customer_reviews.text: These are the best treats I have ever found for my cats. They are the healthiest and tastiest treats compared to any other I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: 4felines

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Is Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with these. After he contracted a UTI, I switched his food and treats, and these came recommended by a vet. A bit pricey, but they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat your cat will love!
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews about cats going crazy for these. Well, they are so right about this! Our cat absolutely loves these! He gets every last crumb. I usually break them up into smaller pieces and that works well. It is an expensive product, but we feel positive because the quality is so high.
customer_reviews.author: Diane N

customer_reviews.title: Crack for cats
customer_reviews.text: Well, the cats love it. Kind of crumbly, I have to break it up, the cats can't handle the big pieces. But they really love it!
customer_reviews.author: catlady

customer_reviews.title: Freeze Dried Chicken
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and I love that they are just chicken, no added ingredients. They would be perfect if so many of them didn't turn to chicken dust at the bottom of the container. I am considering buying a sugar shaker and using the chicken dust as a topping on their regular dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Done
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a cat I haven’t tasted them, but my cat is eating them
customer_reviews.author: betty jean hutson

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these but I have to break them up, 2 of my cats had stomatits & had to have all their teeth pulled, cause they can't chew them. I like they are made in the USA & are just 1 ingredient. Give your kitties a healthy treat!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Our pets love it
customer_reviews.text: Our pets will stop whatever they are doing and race to the pantry from wherever they are when they hear the rustling/rattling of the bag of this product. We use them for normal rewarding of good-behavior and just loving rewards. These treats are also great to soften the impact of having to give pets medicine by following the not-so-desirable medicine dispensation with the very desirable treat.
customer_reviews.author: CyberChat

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and both smelled these and just walked away..they looked like dried up tofu..waste of my money. I even broke them up and crumbled them and they walked away from dish.
customer_reviews.author: TMarie2707

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this treat but I have noticed the cat treats are priced higher than dog (for the exact same product -- chicken!) so I purchased the dog treats last time around to save some $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Catsrulemyheart28

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cats go crazy for these treats. The only downside is the crumbs and dust particles left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie0523

customer_reviews.title: Good for my diabetic kitty
customer_reviews.text: I tried these before I started poaching and freezing chicken myself for diabetic-friendly treats for my cat. The pieces are large, so if that is what you want, this is the treat for you! The pieces are easily rehydrated with some water, so if that is what you want, this works!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Prrrrr, prrrr ... our cats love these
customer_reviews.text: Our cats LOVE these dried chicken treats! In fact - one of them starts reminding me mid-morning every day that it's time for treats. I love that they are 100% chicken - with no additives. We've been using these for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: I had to throw it away
customer_reviews.text: These treats arrived destroyed like flour. like small pieces of granola and my cat likes big chunks. I had to throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: A treat my cats love
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats love this treat. I have one cat that got the bag off the table and was trying to open it. I have to make sure it is in a cabinet because they would eat the whole bag. They have never done that with any other treat.. so this one is good.
customer_reviews.author: JC Cats

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves it and every time I come home ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves it and every time I come home, he'll ask for one. Either give him a treat or let him out of the house :) No, he can't get out, we have eagles circling the neighborhood so he get his treat instead.
customer_reviews.author: BerNard

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it, she will lead me to where it is kept every chance she gets.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this! I wish there was more chicken breast in the bag for the price. Overall, cat approved!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about these from Floppycats.com. My kitties go nuts for these. I love that they are a safe and healthy way to give them treats. The first time we gave these to our kitties our 11 mo. old kitten ran around with a piece in her mouth as if she caught a mouse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely substitute for unhealthy treats
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loved pounce treats but we were trying to clean up his diet in his old age. He prefers these. We have to crumble them slightly for him, otherwise they're hard to handle. Our dog loves them, too!!
customer_reviews.author: snowbird567

customer_reviews.title: Freeze-dried Chicken Treats
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE these. One can be finicky, but she comes running every time she hears the bad rustle. Sometimes she won't eat food I know she actually likes until I put chicken dust on it (I am a total sucker). Someone else said they bought the dog size, because it's bigger and cheaper. I'm going to look into that, as I intend to always have these on hand.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: dust
customer_reviews.text: poor quality for price - cancelled subscription for that reason
customer_reviews.author: 2cat mom

customer_reviews.title: Training treat.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as s training treat for my cat. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Marg S

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Treat Ever
customer_reviews.text: My Siberian cat LOVES these treats. I have them in both beef and chicken. I would give them more often but they are a bit costly, so I save them as a special treat for like after grooming or a nail trim.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Pinklady

customer_reviews.title: YAY! Just Chicken.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is on a restricted, prescription diet for hyperthyroidism and this is the only treat he can have and he loves it. I don't have to worry about him not eating when I crumble this on top of his food.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Best ever cat treat.
customer_reviews.text: Best treats for our cat, who will actually come running when she hears the bag and will eat them our of our hands. Dog likes them too, but she eats literally everything, so don't take her review. Listen to the cat, she's very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and a much better option for your animals. Don't short your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Good but Big pieces
customer_reviews.text: Cats enjoy them as treats. Some of the pieces are quite large and must be made smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Jenafur Rebecca Maher-Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a hit
customer_reviews.text: This is quite the magnet for our cats. In addition, the oldest one has some stomach issues now and then and is reluctant to eat enough during these episodes. But I can get some calories into him with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE pure chicken meat!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this and my husband enjoys giving healthy treats that won't spoil!
customer_reviews.author: M'ette

customer_reviews.title: Our kittens are so crazy about these that they beg ...
customer_reviews.text: Our kittens are so crazy about these that they beg for them all day (and night!). I have to make sure to keep them in stock at home!
customer_reviews.author: djackson

product_meta.title: Whole Life Pet Healthy Cat Treats
product_meta.description:
Size:4oz.Guranteed Analysis:

Crude Protein: 80% MIN
Crude Fat: 3% MIN
Crude Fiber: 1% MAX
Moisture: 2% MAX

Ingredients: Pure Chicken

What's Not in the Bag:

More than one ingredient.
Chemicals
Preservatives
Additives
Fillers
Allergens
feature_bullets: PURE HUMAN GRADE CHICKEN: Nothing but the best ingredients for your cat, these pure chicken cat treats are sourced in the USA and are great as a snack or meal topper for your cat. Ideal for all cats or kittens and especially designed for training, to help finicky eaters, cats with gastro-intestinal issues or those who are overweight.

ONE SIMPLE INGREDIENT: These snacks have no added preservatives, chemicals, salts or artificial flavors, Just One Simple Ingredient 100% Pure Chicken Cat Treats are freeze dried to preserve the naturally rich protein snack. The foundation of a healthy diet starts with minimally processed, whole foods and treats.

QUALITY FIRST - THEY CAN'T CHOOSE, IT'S UP TO YOU: The most important decision you make as a pet parent is choosing what to feed. Every batch goes through rigorous quality and freshness tests going above and beyond USA regulations to ensure a verified safe product for your pet.

PROTEIN RICH CAT TREAT: Rich in protein and low in fat, this is a low calorie healthy cat treat that has been freeze dried to retain all of the quality protein found in naturally sourced Human Grade Pure Chicken Breast
MADE IN THE USA: US Sourced Chicken, Produced and Packaged in the USA, Made in house in Small Fresh Batches daily by our pet loving staff
